news_title: Wall Street Goes Crypto: Bank of America Backs Bitcoin Allocations
news_subtitle: Bank of America has moved from client-requested access to active endorsement, now advising clients to allocate up to 4% of their portfolios to Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies.

news_title: Bank of America Allows 4% Crypto Allocation
news_subtitle: Customers now advised to allocate up to 4% in Bitcoin and digital assets. Read original article on nftenex.com

news_title: Bank of America lets wealth advisers recommend Bitcoin ETFs
news_subtitle: Bank of America will let Merrill, Private Bank, and Merrill Edge advisers recommend four CIO‑approved spot Bitcoin ETFs, opening BTC access to more US wealth clients.
